elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: The Swiss cantons use all forms of economic cooperation among themselves. However, Switzerland works less closely with the EU. How can you tell?

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: Mark the correct reason.
choices: Switzerland has no access to the European free trade area.
Switzerland does not form a customs, currency and economic union with the EU.
Switzerland only exports machines and watches to the EU.
elements.correctAnswer: Switzerland does not form a customs, currency and economic union with the EU.
